ingredients.item: 1 bunch salad onions, cut into 1cm slices
2 tsp Bart Infusions Mixed Herbs Paste
200g pack essential Waitrose Cooked Seafood Selection
Handful of fresh basil from a large pot, roughly torn

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water for 5 minutes. Add the cavolo nero and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the spaghetti is just tender, then drain well and return to the pan.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a separate pan and fry the salad onions and garlic for 2 minutes. Add the canned tomatoes, herb and tomato pastes, then fill the tomato can half full with water and add to the pan. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the seafood selection and cook for 1 minute until heated through. Season, add the basil, then toss into the spaghetti and serve.
